message.raw:
* run.py:
(set_option): fix for use with track_specs in train.tab
(bed_filename): add support for multiple worlds in identify
(num_tracks): return len(self.head_trackname_list) so that it works
with multiple worlds
(Runner.run_identify_posterior): multiple world support
(Runner.run) [self.posterior and self.num_worlds != 1]: NotImplementedError

* task.py (replace_args_filelistname): fix prefix, suffix order of
temporary filelists
(run_posterior_save_bed, run_viterbi_save_bed): style

* output.py (make_filename): new function
(IdentifySaver.concatenate, IdentifySaver.__call__, PosteriorSaver.__call__): multiple world support

message:
* run.py:
(set_option): fix for use with track_specs in train.tab
(bed_filename): add support for multiple worlds in identify
(num_tracks): return len(self.head_trackname_list) so that it works
with multiple worlds
(Runner.run_identify_posterior): multiple world support
(Runner.run) [self.posterior and self.num_worlds != 1]: NotImplementedError

* task.py (replace_args_filelistname): fix prefix, suffix order of
temporary filelists
(run_posterior_save_bed, run_viterbi_save_bed): style

* output.py (make_filename): new function
(IdentifySaver.concatenate, IdentifySaver.__call__, PosteriorSaver.__call__): multiple world support
